AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: Country where the legal proceedings are taking place, country of the magistrate judge
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Court: legal body presiding over the case involving defendants Ricardo Rodriguez, Jr. and Ignacio Rodriguez, Jr., with relevant precedents regarding traffic stops and reasonable suspicion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer Police Department: Employer of Officer Reymundo Reyes, involved in the traffic stop of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.traffic stop: law enforcement action taken based on reasonable suspicion of illegal activity, assessed in two parts: justification at inception and reasonableness of subsequent actions, with a scope that must be temporary and last no longer than necessary to effectuate the purpose of the stop
